section.title: Warehouse Calendar Exceptions
section.para: Warehouse calendar exceptions allow you to define variations from the standard work week for a Warehouse(s). For example, you can indicate whether a Warehouse will be closed for a company holiday--or whether extra shifts are being added to extend the standard week.

note.para: The Buffer Management system will consider calendar exceptions when determining the time buffer status for an Item Site.

section.para: To access the master list of calendar exceptions, select the "Warehouse Calendar Exceptions" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Warehouse Calendar Exceptions" screen displays information on all existing Warehouse calendar exceptions, including affected Warehouse(s) and a description of the exception.
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

Enables you to edit Warehouse calendar exceptions. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Warehouse calendar exception--except that when editing, the fields will contain Warehouse calendar exception information. Double-clicking on a Warehouse calendar exception will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Warehouse calendar exception and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Warehouse calendar exception and then select this button to remove it from the list.
